description: The stability, durability and support of a trail running outfit tough enough to take on your toughest adventures. The XA Pro 3D V9 Gore-Tex is an icon among icons, as reliable as it is famous. Ultra-stable, ultra-resistant, even more adherent and offering excellent grip and robust protection, it is equipped with adapted crampon profiles and a waterproof membrane.
name: Salomon XA Pro 3D V9 GTX - Mens

specs.value: It features our 3D Advanced Chassis™, a low, ultra-stable profile that optimizes motion control and provides underfoot protection and stability in all directions
The reinforced stone guard provides reassuring and robust foot protection
Designed with a weather-resistant GORE-TEX membrane for optimal protection against the elements
